name: Imperious Perfect
oracle_text:
Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1.
{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
flavor_text: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

name: Immaculate Magistrate
oracle_text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.
flavor_text: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures—sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

name: Fyndhorn Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "We could no more abandon the forest than the stars could abandon the night sky."

name: "Numa, Joraga Chieftain"
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {X}{X}. If you do, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of target Elf creatures you control.
Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

name: Farhaven Elf
oracle_text: When Farhaven Elf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Verdant bloom does exist. It merely hides for its own safety."

name: "Yurlok, the Mana Burner"
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever a player loses unspent mana, they lose that much life.
{1}, {T}: Each player adds {B}{R}{G}.

name: "Infinity Stone"
oracle_text: If you would lose unspent mana, that mana becomes colorless instead.

name: Valakut Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Valakut Invoker deals 3 damage to any target.
